document.forum_title: Latest Asia-Pacific News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: 'Special needs' term singles out students and will be scrapped - Government
document.topic_text: 'Special needs' term singles out students and will be scrapped - Government Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 37 minutes ago ) The term "special needs" education is likely to be scrapped because of concerns it singles out students.More money will also be spent on preschoolers to try and help them as early as possible - likely meaning less funding for special...
